news.title: Coffee news and more and more and more test
news.content: March 13th, 2020: World of Coffee & Warsaw World Coffee Championships Postponed to October 15-17, 2020

news.title: Learn about latte art
news.content: Learn about how to steam milk for latte art! French press is a perfect tool for frothing milk. First, you need to heat up the milk and then pour it into the french press. Finally, vigorously start to move the press´ knob up and down, until the foam is formed...

news.title: A coffee bean is a seed of the Coffea plant and the source for coffee.
news.content: The two most economically important varieties of coffee plant are the Arabica and the Robusta Arabica beans consist of 0.8–1.4% caffeine and Robusta beans consist of 1.7–4% caffeine
